comment.author: 87656429@N08
comment._content: Oh my goodness this place looks different nowdays! It´s a huge intersection called "Korsvägen" (Cross road) with cars, buses, trams.. And the congress center is a multiple of buildings and with a huge hotel (Hotel Gothia Towers) consisting of two (soon to be three) giant sky scrapers. sv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svenska_M%C3%A4ssan

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
miss archivist: Thanks for posting the link, showing us the place today! As you say - the difference is striking! 
/Anna B.
